channel.title: 498 Compiler Errors
channel.description:
I've come across that I can't seem to solve, when working on a 498 source. Can anyone help me out with these? NOTE: Yes I use eclipse.
[code]Compiling... src\org\arios\game\system\mysql\SQLConnectionPool.java:8: error: package com.jol box.bonecp does not exist import com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCP; ^ src\org\arios\game\system\mysql\SQLConnectionPool.java:9: error: package com.jol box.bonecp does not exist import com.jolbox.bonecp.BoneCPConfig; ^ src\org\arios\game\system\mysql\SQLConnectionPool.java:36: error: cannot find sy mbol private static BoneCP pool; ^ symbol: class BoneCP location: class SQLConnectionPool src\org\arios\game\node\entity\player\Player.java:32: error: cannot access Login Configuration import org.arios.game.node.entity.player.info.login.LoginConfiguration; ^ bad source file: src\org\arios\game\node\entity\player\info\login\LoginConfigu ration.java file does not contain class org.arios.game.node.entity.player.info.login.Log inConfiguration Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the sou rcepath. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: 498 Compiler Errors
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Two issues I see in that eclipse log:

  1. You need to fix the imports

  2. You need to set the project settings to Java 1.8

Read full topic
